events.title: Bracelets Fundraiser
events.description: We will be selling custom-made bracelets to raise funds for our club. One of our officers has already bought a bracelet making kit with their own money and has expressed willingness to bring the kit to the fundraiser. We will be selling the bracelets at a price of $2 for one bracelet and $3 for two bracelets.

events.description: A workshop to understand common stigmas, intergenerational trauma, and its impact on Filipino and Fil-Am families and community.

events.title: Pilipino Cultural Night 16
events.description: Pilipino Cultural Night (PCN) is a student-produced theatrical performance that highlights Filipino and Filipino American culture, history, and identity through an original storyline interwoven with traditional dances, music, and modern acts.

events.title: General Meeting #2

Whether you’re here to win big or just vibe, we’ve got snacks, good energy, and plenty of laughs waiting for you. Come hang out and get to know the community!

events.title: Tiny Health Tales General Body Meeting #7
events.description: Tiny Health Tales is a club that is dedicated to improving health literacy across the San Joaquin Valley. To do this, we create videos that educate others about prevalent health issues in the Valley, such as asthma, diabetes, ADHD, and the flu.

events.title: Jaggo Night
events.description: A cultural event showcasing the tradition of "Jaggo" in a Punjabi wedding. Jaggo is a Punjabi wedding tradition involving carrying a pot that is lit up with lamps and walking through the village. This tradition is a way of inviting the village to the wedding and getting blessings for the bride and groom. In this event, we will do a step-by-step performance showcasing the Jaggo tradition as a way to teach the UC Merced student community about Punjabi cultural traditions.
